factionKeyword: adeptus astartesadeptus astartesadeptus astartesadeptus astartesadeptus astartesadeptus astartesadeptus astartesadeptus astartes
lore: Skilled warrior and masterful leader, Uriel Ventris is one of the Ultramarines’ most capable commanders – if a maverick one. Having served in the Deathwatch before becoming Captain, he has absorbed the strategies of battle-brothers from a host of other Chapters, giving him a breadth of tactical insight exceeding that of many of his peers.

otherAbilities.name: Unorthodox Strategist:
otherAbilities.description: While this model is leading a unit, you can target that unit with a Stratagem even if that Stratagem has already been used on another unit from your army this phase. In addition, this model’s unit can still be selected as the target of a Stratagem while Battle-shocked .

otherAbilities.name: Master of the Fleet:
otherAbilities.description: During the Declare Battle Formations step, if your army includes this model, select one ADEPTUS ASTARTES ADEPTUS ASTARTES ADEPTUS ASTARTES ADEPTUS ASTARTES ADEPTUS ASTARTES ADEPTUS ASTARTES ADEPTUS ASTARTES ADEPTUS ASTARTES INFANTRY unit from your army. That unit gains the Deep Strike ability.
